import StatusCard from 'components/StatusCard'; import TableCard from 'components/TableCard'; export default function Dashboard() { const [posts, setPosts] = useState([]); const getData = async () => { const response = await fetch("http://localhost:5000/api/workers"); setPosts(await response.json()); }; useEffect(() => { getData(); }, []); return ( <>
{posts.map(({ id, name, budget, city, requiredworkers, pno,existingno }) => ( {name} {city} {' '} {requiredworkers}
{existingno}
{budget} ))}
); }
